channel.title: [hyperion] cannot make my self owner! [help]
channel.description: Hello, i have currently got a hyperion server running but i cannot seem to make myself owner o.O i know how to you go into packets and into command packet and search "brown" and change it for your name then go ingame and go "::giverights 2 (playername)" but it wont work! i cannot do the command and when i put it back to brown and log in as brows and do it to my character it says "error setting rights for god ownz"

item.title: [hyperion] cannot make my self owner! [help]

item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

never have done hyperion before

Read full topic

item.title: [hyperion] cannot make my self owner! [help]
item.dc:creator: @_google ~google~
item.description:
@_google wrote:

read its hyperion you can’t read character files or change them to add admin you go to your constants.java, and find the owner string and change what ever name there is to yours.

Read full topic

item.title: [hyperion] cannot make my self owner! [help]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote="~google~, post:6, topic:336037"][quote author=relmitos link=topic=432415.msg3177696#msg3177696 date=1271015917]
Open the class org.hyperion.rs2.packet.CommandPacketHandler and create a command for it.

[/quote]

how can he create an admin command if he doesn’t know where you add admin.[/quote]
Well he has the server files, so anyone could lol

but anyways, you should have some sort of character files.
Acess those character files and find your name, it should be a txt file. open it and there should be a string called Player Rights.
Change it from 0 to 3. sometimes its 4.

Read full topic
